DESCRIPTION: Create a shortcut to run commands in custom ways.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: Shortcuts allow you to create different command names for specific commands or create macros for your own custom commands.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}shortcutcreate na role na** ~ Create a shortcut that allows users to give themself the na role by just typing *{{prefix}}na*.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}shortcutcreate eu role eu | send [Channel] Welcome %usermention% to the EU channel** ~ Creates a shortcut macro that when a user types *{{prefix}}eu* it will give them the eu role and then send an alert to a channel  with the send command.
EXTENDED_LINE_5: ~ Creates a shortcut that accepts an argument from a user. Now the user can type *{{prefix}}rank na* or *{{prefix}}rank eu* and get the roles. The 1 correlates to the first argument the user provides. To use the second you would do {{2}} etc..
EXTENDED_LINE_6: Note: **{{prefix}}shortcutcreate deletetrigger** ~ adding the word deletetrigger after shortcutcreate will cause your shortcut to delete its trigger message.
NAME_TAKEN: **{{name}}** is already being used by another shortcut.
